q_en: What products are included in PolyU's January 2024 orders?
gt:
Hello there! üòÑ Let's take a look at the products included in the order named "James_WinterOrder" for the customer "PolyU". Here's a neat table with all the details:

| Product ID | Attributes     | Description |
|------------|----------------|-------------|
| 1          | Red, M size    | T-shirt     |
| 19         | Blue, L size   | T-shirt     |
| 3          | White, XL size | T-shirt     |
| 11         | Green, M size  | T-shirt     |
| 27         | Yellow, S size | T-shirt     |

These are the fabulous T-shirts included in the order! If you have any more questions, feel free to ask! üòä

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM customers WHERE customer_name = 'PolyU';
steps.description: Retrieve the customer ID for the customer with the name "PolyU"

steps.sql: SELECT product_id, number FROM order_product WHERE order_id = '1';
steps.description: Retrieve the product IDs and quantities for the order from Step2

steps.sql: SELECT p.attributes, pt.description FROM products p JOIN products_types pt ON p.products_type_id = pt.id WHERE p.id IN (1, 19, 3, 11, 27);
steps.description: Retrieve the product attributes and types for the product IDs from Step3
